text:
I am trying to use wlappc to build EJBs in my Weblogic 8.1 application.
I am actually using ANT 1.5.3 that comes bundled with Weblogic 8.1 server.

I recieve the following error during the build process. I have set my 
JAVA_HOME, ANT_HOME, CLASSPATH AND PATH variables properly.  I do not 
understand why the error is printing out such a long classpath, because I do 
not have those set in my CLASSPATH.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
<wlappc> is not an Ant task, it probably comes from weblogic. As such, we cannot
accept bug reports against it. 

Try whatever weblogic support channels you have, and Ant's user mailing list. 

sorry.
